email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $51.00 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.75 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.75 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, received the charter party agreement. Everything looks in order. Let’s finalize the deal. Looking forward to working with you. Best, John
